Name: Average time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and SW-Reviewer Agreed in cases that originated from the variant beginning with \SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion → Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation\
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and SW-Reviewer Agreed across all variants containing both activities
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time it takes SW-Reviewer Agreed to occur after Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 in cases where both appear consecutively or non-consecutively
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average waiting time to SW-Reviewer Agreed following the execution of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Time elapsed from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in variants that include a successful reviewer agreement
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average duration between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and SW-Reviewer No Response in cases where agreement was not reached
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer No Response'

Name: Minimum time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and any subsequent reviewer-related activity (e.g., SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined, SW-Reviewer No Response)
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Elapsed time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and SW-Reviewer Agreed compared to the elapsed time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 and SW-Reviewer Agreed within the same case
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average time it takes SW-Reviewer Agreed to occur after Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 in high-complexity variants (those with more than 10 distinct activities post-submission)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total resolution time of the interval starting at Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and ending at SW-Reviewer Agreed in manuscripts that required multiple reviewer invitations
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to SW-AE Assign Reviewers when no agreement is recorded within 7 days
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Minimum time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and SW-Reviewer Selection is now due in overdue assignment paths
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due'

Name: Average time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and SW-Reviewer Agreed in cases that originated from the variant beginning with SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion → Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to SW-Reviewer Agreed specifically in variants that eventually lead to SW-EIC Accept or SW-EIC Major Revision
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
